familyMemberEthics.description: Former director/chairman/president/treasurer/secretary of Trump Productions LLC (F/K/A Rancho Lien LLC), in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned 2059048 in production revenue income from TRUMP PRODUCTIONS LLC, valued at $1,000,001 - $5,000,000. Underlying Assets: production company. Location: New York, NY. See attached schedule.
familyMemberEthics.business: Trump Productions LLC (F/K/A Rancho Lien LLC)

familyMemberEthics.description: Former president/member of Trump Production Managing Member Inc., in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
